import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var loaderSlice=createSlice({name:"loader",initialState:{isLoading:false},reducers:{showLoader:function showLoader(state){console.log("loading started");state.isLoading=true;},hideLoader:function hideLoader(state){console.log("loading stopped");state.isLoading=false;},setLoading:function setLoading(state,action){state.isLoading=action.payload;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _loaderSlice$actions=loaderSlice.actions,showLoader=_loaderSlice$actions.showLoader,hideLoader=_loaderSlice$actions.hideLoader;export{showLoader,hideLoader};export default loaderSlice.reducer;
